New Records: Rohit Sharma went past Sachin Tendulkar for the most hundreds at the ODI World Cup
Rohit Sharma scored the fastest century by an Indian at an ODI World Cup, reaching it in 63 balls
Key Match Events: Jasprit Bumrah took 4 wickets for 39 runs
India won by 8 wickets with 90 balls remaining
Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan won the toss and elected to bat first
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's disciplined performance with the ball restricted Afghanistan to a below-par total
Afghanistan's innings included a 121-run partnership between Shahidi and Omarzai
Mohammad Siraj conceded 76 runs in nine overs
Hardik Pandya took a crucial wicket of Omarzai with an off cutter
Kuldeep Yadav dismissed Shahidi with a reverse sweep
